interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetTemperatureLevel
interface.description: This interface provides a capability to set target temperature level.

property.name: MaxLevel
property.description: Maximum value allowed for target temperature level setting.

property.name: TargetLevel
property.description: Target set-point value of temperature level

property.name: SelectableTemperatureLevels
property.description: List of the values of temperature level which can be selected
